vaccination.HV.Q9.title.0.en: Did you receive a flu vaccine during the previous flu season (2022-2023)

vaccination.HV.Q9.helpGroup.text.3.en: Answer 'yes' if you were vaccinated in autumn/winter 2022-2023.

vaccination.HV.Q10.title.0.en: Have you received a flu vaccine this autumn/winter season? (2023-2024)

vaccination.HV.Q10b.title.0.en: When were you vaccinated against flu this season (2023-2024)?

vaccination.HV.Q10d.title.0.en: What were your reasons for NOT getting a seasonal influenza vaccination in season 2022/2023?
